name: spknetwork-auth-monorepo
description: A library for authenticating with ceramic using Hive Keychain and interacting with IDX for user profile data.

scripts.clean:node_modules: pnpm recursive exec -- rm -rf node_modules; rm shrinkwrap.yaml; rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run clean:node_modules
